languages.text: Whenever the wearer scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by this {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} is increased by +50%. This effect resets after they or their ally perform a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer scores a critical hit for the first time in combat the damage dealt by this critical hit is increased by +50%. This effect resets after they or their ally perform a heroic act or a desperate measure.

Whenever the wearer scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by this {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} is increased by +50%. This effect resets after they or their ally perform a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.

Whenever the wearer scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by this {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} is increased by +50%. This effect resets after they or their ally perform a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者在战斗中首次进行{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}此次暴击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。当装备者或盟友发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}后，此加成效果可再度触发。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by this {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} is increased by +50%. This effect resets after they or their ally perform a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者在战斗中首次进行暴击时，此次{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击{/g}造成的伤害提高50%。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}当装备者或盟友发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}后，此加成{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}可再度触发。

当装备者在战斗中首次进行{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}此次暴击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。当装备者或盟友发动{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}后，此加成{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}可再度触发。

languages.text: Первое {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g}, совершенное персонажем в бою, наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, увеличенный на 50%. Этот же бонус действует для первого критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} после того, как персонаж или его союзники применяют {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянные меры{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by this {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} is increased by +50%. This effect resets after they or their ally perform a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Первое критическое попадание, совершенное персонажем в бою, наносит урон, увеличенный на 50%. Этот же бонус действует для первого критического попадания после того, как персонаж или его союзники применяют героический акт или отчаянные меры.

Первое критическое попадание, совершенное персонажем в бою, наносит урон, увеличенный на 50%. Этот же бонус действует для первого критического попадания после того, как персонаж или его союзники применяют героический акт или отчаянные меры.

languages.text: 使用者が戦闘で初めてクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}すると、この{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}による与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が50%増える。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は、使用者またはその味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を行った後にリセットされる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in combat the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by this {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} is increased by +50%. This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} resets after they or their ally perform a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が戦闘で初めてクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}すると、この{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}による与ダメージが50％増える。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}は、使用者またはその味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を行ったり{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を使用したりした後にリセットされる。

使用者が戦闘で初めてクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}すると、この{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}による与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が50%増える。この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は、使用者またはその味方が{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}を行った後にリセットされる。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico por primera vez en combate, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} causado por este {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} aumenta +50 %. Este efecto se reinicia después de que el portador o uno de sus aliados realicen un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o una {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by this {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} is increased by +50%. This effect resets after they or their ally perform a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador realice un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico por primera vez en combate, el daño causado por este {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g} aumenta +50 %. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} se reinicia después de que el portador o uno de sus aliados realicen un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} o una {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Trägerim Kampf erstmals einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} erzielt, erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} dieses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffers{/g} um +50 %. Dieser Effekt wird zurückgesetzt, nachdem der Träger oder ein Verbündeter eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} oder eine {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} ausführt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by this {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} is increased by +50%. This effect resets after they or their ally perform a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger zum ersten Mal im Kampf einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} erzielt, erhöht sich der Schaden dieses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischen Treffers{/g} um +50 %. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} wird zurückgesetzt, nachdem der Träger oder ein Verbündeter eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} oder eine {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} ausführt.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur porte un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique pour la première fois au combat, les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par ce {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} augmentent de +50 %. Cet effet se réinitialise dès que l'utilisateur ou son allié a recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} ou à une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g}.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, çatışmada ilk kez kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} yaptığında bu {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşun{/g} verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} +%50 artar. Bu etki, giyen kişi veya dost birimleri {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} gerçekleştirdiklerinde sıfırlanır.
